snippet.title: Far From The Darkness - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A first-person multiplayer game inspired by the Werewolf concept. Depending on your role, investigate and hunt werewolves or betray your squad. Strategize, collaborate, and survive while communicating through proximity chat!

Wishlist the game on steam !
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3256050/Far_From_The_Darkness/

#gaming  #steam #announcement #trailer #werewolf #multiplayer
